org.encog.examples.ml.tsp.anneal

Class TSPSimulatedAnnealing

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.encog.ml.anneal.SimulatedAnnealing<Integer>

  • public class TSPSimulatedAnnealing
extends org.encog.ml.anneal.SimulatedAnnealing<Integer>
    TSPSimulatedAnnealing: Implementation of the simulated annealing algorithm that trys to solve the traveling salesman problem.
